__TOC__

This is the Home of the Telepathy team, we also live in `#ubuntu-desktop` on `irc.freenode.net`.

=== Vision ===

We're going to 
* integrate the efforts of <nowiki>[[http://telepathy.freedesktop.org/|Telepathy Upstream]]</nowiki> into Ubuntu
* work on <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/people/telepathy/+packagebugs|bugs]]</nowiki>, fix or forward them upstream
* package <nowiki>[[http://telepathy.freedesktop.org/releases/|new modules]]</nowiki>
* our <nowiki>[[TODO]]</nowiki> list

=== Work to be done ===

This list shows how you can help out:
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/people/telepathy/+packagebugs|Bugs]]</nowiki>, also DebuggingTelepathy
* Packaging, <nowiki>[[Telepathy-Modules]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[Telepathy-HelpingOut]]</nowiki>
* Cheerlead
* Test

=== Upstream ===

Our friends of Telepathy upstream:
* Empathy developers live in `#empathy` on `irc.gnome.org`
* Telepathy developers live in `#telepathy` on `irc.freenode.net`
* have a <nowiki>[[http://lists.freedesktop.org/mailman/listinfo/telepathy|mailing list]]</nowiki>

=== Links (Must Reads) ===

* http://live.gnome.org/Empathy
* http://telepathy.freedesktop.org/

== Sign up here ==

* Launchpad: https://launchpad.net/people/telepathy/
* Mailing list: https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-telepathy
